search.query: | makeresults | eval client="Agent002_client,Bond446clientxxxxyvvv,RA45DMclientxxxxyvvvv,MKLINEclientxxxxyvvvv,DoD346Gclient,REn83Dclient" | makemv delim="," client | mvexpand client | eval client=rtrim('client',"xxxxyvvv") | rex field=client (?<client_part1>\w+)(?<client_part2>client) | eval client=if(client="Agent002_client",'client',client_part1 +"_"+client_part2)
